channel.title: chronicle on datasci.social
channel.description: Recent content in chronicle on datasci.social

item.title: One month old
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109529632807504224] Btw, today https://datasci.social has turned 1 month old ü•≥ #serverinfo #mastoadmin We are 45 people now, see below our place in the universe of instances:

item.title: 99.990% Uptime
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109506480484787426] Happy to report that in the first 3+ weeks of running datasci.social we had 99.990% uptime. We missed one 5-minute tick. #mastoadmin #serverinfo https://stats.uptimerobot.com/DllMwIoAWM

item.title: One week old
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109410236599220838] Our instance https://datasci.social is now one week old! ü•≥ We are now 39 people, still a good way below our current server capacity of 100. Everything still running smoothly. Waiting for several 2nd-level invites to get used up or expire before thinking about further growth. #mastoadmin #serverinfo

item.title: Instance indexed
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109384382663865252] Update on our https://datasci.social instance, day 3: We are now 33, and more people keep joining, slowly but surely. üêå Everything still running smoothly. #mastoadmin #serverinfo We are also indexed and appear here (highlighted in light blue): https://observablehq.com/@mauforonda/what-goes-on-in-mastodon

item.title: Members update, day 2
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109377758797505850] Update on our https://datasci.social instance, day 2: We are now 23, and more people keep joining, slowly but surely. üêå Everything still running smoothly. #mastoadmin #serverinfo Hi-Five to us! üôå @carolinamttssn @LR @nerdsitu @estebanmoro @yaxi @martikagv @leoferres @alsbirk @trivikverma @NeaveOClery @eflegara @yy @sdesojo @pholme @alel @converge @lajello @annasapienza @Petem @robysinatra @benfmaier @lauretti @mherranz

item.title: First day members
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109371260177603579] After our first day we now have 14 active people on our https://datasci.social server: 6 senior / 8 junior (research-wise) 6 female / 8 male 3 aged 40+ / 11 below 40 Wide variation of followers (2-2580). Everything still running super smoothly. Going to continue to grow veeery carefully for now üêå … #mastoadmin #serverinfo

item.title: datasci.social opened
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109363241516092529] First post from our shiny new server https://datasci.social! Super happy it worked out ü•≥ #mastoadmin #serverinfo The goal of this #server is to create a community of nice & diverse people who are researching #HumanCentric #DataScience and adjacent topics. Due to capacity/funding limits, https://datasci.social will be joinable via invites only for some time. +Welcome to our first members @estebanmoro and @nerdsitu !
